meanings: (옛날 시험제도) gwageo, the highest-level state examination to recruit ranking officials during the Goryeo and Joseon Dynasty

vlive.korean: 과거... Also, the past... 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 수상한 영업이 시작된다! (호텔 델루나 티저 메이킹)
[태현잘알] - 눈이랑 웃는 얼굴이 너무 태현이었어 - 왜 저의 과거 사진을... [Know TAEHYUN] - He has TAEHYUN's eyes. - Why did you bring out my old photo? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Know TAEHYUN] - He has TAEHYUN's eyes. - Why did you bring out my old photo?

vlive.korean: 보니까 과거... I saw that and in the past... 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스! 다녀왔어요 퇴근길인가요?
vlive.english: I saw that and in the past...

vlive.korean: '과거에는 내가 행복했나?' "Was I happy in the past?" 듣기 View video BTS : 진짜 오랜만 🤣🤣
왜 과거의 나는 저랬을까? Why did the past me do that? 듣기 View video VICTON : 2020
vlive.english: Why did the past me do that?
